Welcome

Hi!

I am a PhD candidate at SIP Lab at the Univeristy of Warwick, under the supervision of Dr. Victor Sanchez. My research interests are focused on Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Explainable Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Vision.

My PhD research receives funding from the Government of India under the scheme of National Overseas Scholarship. I obtained my master’s degree from Maharashtra Institute of Technology, India, and completed my bachelor’s studies at Rashtrasant Tukadoji Maharaj Nagpur University, India.
